system.description:
In addition to creating damaging blasts of elemental energy, elementalists are able to command and control elemental material at a distance. As an action, an elementalist can create effects at a range of 30 feet, manipulating ambient elemental material to create any of the following effects. You must possess the proper elemental affinity to control an element.

  • Elemental material weighing up to 5 lbs per elementalist level can be moved up to 30 feet.

  • Elemental material up to a cubic foot can be reshaped (such as ice or stone), using your power in place of any required tool proficiencies. Shapes can be made in amorphous elements (like air, fire, or water), but the shapes only hold for as long as you spend an action.

  • Fire can be used to ignite flammable material. It can be used to expand a fire up to 5-feet, provided fuel is present. It can extinguish flames as large as a 5-foot cube, or a 5-foot cubic portion. You can create and hold a flame in your hand without burning yourself.
